definition: alpha Ursae Majoris
day/sky/heaven
hinge/pivot
alpha Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper

sentences.english: That's why these two stars, Dubhe and Merak, are known as "The Pointers."
sentences.chinese: 这也是为什么天枢星和北斗二星被称作指极星。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo ascertain the curative effect of deep puncture of point Tianshu (ST 25) on colic slow-transport constipation.
sentences.chinese: 目的明确深刺天枢穴对结肠慢转运性便秘的疗效。

sentences.english: Dubhe was the most glorious star.
Dubhe is the most glorious star.
And needling Tianshu point deeply do not cause serious abdominal cavity infection, it is safe and feasible.
sentences.chinese: 天枢穴深刺不会引起严重的腹腔内感染，安全可行。
